lead_paragraph: A local news report said the cell was planning simultaneous attacks on the subway systems of St. Petersburg and Yekaterinburg.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Russia: Seven Accused of Terrorist Plot
headline.main: Russia Detains 7 Suspected of Planning Terrorist Attacks

snippet: A local news report said the cell was planning simultaneous attacks on the subway systems of St. Petersburg and Yekaterinburg.
abstract: Russia's Federal Security Service announces it has detained seven suspected members of terrorist cell aligned with Islamic State group in Yekaterinburg.
